channel.title: CVE Feed for Liferay -- DXP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Liferay -- DXP

item.title: CVE-2023-44308|2024-08-28T16:29:31.044Z -- liferay -- dxp
item.description: Open redirect vulnerability in adaptive media administration page in Liferay DXP 2023.Q3 before patch 6, and 7.4 GA through update 92 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary external URLs via the _com_liferay_adaptive_media_web_portlet_AMPortlet_redirect parameter.
